name: Baaaaad Neighbourhood
description:
WINDOWS VERSION NOT WORKING! I DISABLED THE DOWNLOAD, PLEASE USE THE WEB VERSION, SORRY GUYS :(

My submission for 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

Pretty stupid game about farm animals not understanding what being polite is and roaming around the neighbourhood*. Wreak havoc and see your neighbours' yards turning into giant mess!

*Neighbourhood... Neighbourhood... Neigh... NEIGH! Damn, I should've make this game about horses too! Well, that's a wasted opportunity for a double pun in the title :|

(No animals were harmed during the production of the game)

May be a little laggy in web, sorry! You can always download for better results :(

Controls:

Arrow keys to move camera around

Left mouse button [LMB] to plant firecracker

Right mouse button [RMB] to place hay (hey, what's up?)

Have fun!

Framework: Godot 3.2

Text editor/IDE: Vim

Art Tool: Inkscape & Krita

Audio tool: Audacity

Sounds: Freesound.org

Music: Bensound.com <3
